name: Whimsicott
author: sui
flavor_text: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.

attacks.name: Helping Hand
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Cotton Guard
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
